DOC.brief_summary: The Aim study determine relationship serum concentration cancer antigen-125 ( CA-125 ) pre-eclampsia severity .
DOC.detailed_description: Although source CA-125 pregnancy fetal chorion , amniotic fluid , maternal decidua , perinatal dynamic maternal serum CA-125 require clarification . Clinical study CA-125 level function hypertensive pregnant patient limit offered contradictory result ( Cebesoy et al. , 2009 ) . And investigate CA-125 normal pregnancy pre-eclampsia , compare mild sever pre-eclampsia determine relationship CA-125 severity disease . Patients divide three group : - Control : 40 normal healthy pregnant woman attend ER labor . - Mild pre-eclampsia : 40 patient fulfil follow criterion . - Blood pressure : systolic blood pressure > 140 < 160 , Diastolic blood pressure > 90 < 110 - Proteinuria : 300 mg ( + ) assess urine urignost 3AÂ® ( urine strip DIALAB ) . - No symptoms severity headache . - Normal investigation different organ function ( liver kidney function ) . - Severe pre-eclampsia :40 patient fulfil anyone follow criterion ( The American College Obstetricians Gynecologists , 2010 ) ( ACOG ) : - Systolic blood pressure > 160 mmHg - Diastolic blood pressure > 110 mmHg ( two occasion least 6 hour apart patient bed rest ) - Proteinuria 5000mg ( 5g ) high 24-hour urine collection least 3+ two random urine sample collect least 4 hour apart - Oliguria < 500 mL urine output 24 hour - Cerebral visual functional disturbance ( cns irritability ) - Pulmonary edema cyanosis ( due excessive intravenous volume replacement ) - Epigastric right-upper quadrant abdominal pain - Impaired liver function laboratory analysis ( elevated aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) , alanine amino transferase ( ALT ) , lactate dehydrogenase ( LDH ) ) - Thrombocytopenia ( platelet count < 150,000/uL ) - Fetal growth restriction .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : pregnant woman 3rd trim age medically free least history sign symptom preeclampsia Other cause elevate CA125 : ovarian cancer , endometrial cancer , breast cancer benign condition : endometriosis liver cirrhosis .
